items.title: Introducing: built-in git worktree support for Claude Code
items.raw_summary:
Introducing: built-in git worktree support for Claude Code 

Now, agents can run in parallel without interfering with one other. Each agent gets its own worktree and can work independently.

The Claude Code Desktop app has had built-in support for worktrees for a while, and now w
items.why_it_matters: Built-in git worktree support in Claude Code lets multiple agents work in parallel on separate branches without conflicts ‚Äî a major workflow unlock for parallel development.
items.action: Try claude -w for parallel agent workflows

- Server previews: Claude starts dev servers and previews your running app in th
items.why_it_matters: Claude Code Desktop ships server previews, auto-review, and auto-fix CI/PR features ‚Äî closing the loop from code generation to deployment review in one tool.

items.title: We‚Äôre starting to roll out a test for ads in ChatGPT today to a subset of free and Go users in the U
items.raw_summary:
We‚Äôre starting to roll out a test for ads in ChatGPT today to a subset of free and Go users in the U.S.

Ads do not influence ChatGPT‚Äôs answers. Ads are labeled as sponsored and visually separate from the response.

Our goal is to give everyone access to ChatGPT for free with few
items.why_it_matters: OpenAI begins testing ads in ChatGPT free tier ‚Äî a strategic shift that contrasts with Anthropic's explicit no-ads stance and signals diverging business models in AI.
items.action: Consider the implications for your AI product's monetization strategy

items.title: Ollama now supports subagents and web search in Claude Code!
items.raw_summary:
Ollama now supports subagents and web search in Claude Code! 

Subagents can run tasks in parallel, such as file search, code exploration, and research, each in their own context.

No MCP servers to configure or API keys required. 

Try it with any model on Ollama's cloud: 

ollama launch claude --model minimax-m2.5:cloud
items.why_it_matters: Ollama adds native subagent and web search support for Claude Code with zero configuration ‚Äî lowering the barrier for local-first AI coding setups.
items.action: Try ollama launch claude with subagent support

items.title: Codex is rolling out company-wide at NVIDIA to ~30k engineers.
items.raw_summary:
Codex is rolling out company-wide at NVIDIA to ~30k engineers.

We partnered closely with their team to deliver cloud-managed admin controls and US-only processing with fail-safes.
items.why_it_matters: NVIDIA rolls out Codex to ~30K engineers company-wide with cloud-managed admin controls ‚Äî the largest known enterprise deployment of an AI coding agent.
items.action: Study NVIDIA's deployment model for enterprise AI coding rollouts

items.title: Huge quality of life upgrade for devs:
items.raw_summary:
Huge quality of life upgrade for devs:

We've added automatic prompt caching to the API which means you no longer have to set cache points in your requests!
items.why_it_matters: Anthropic ships automatic prompt caching to the API, eliminating manual cache point configuration ‚Äî a significant developer experience improvement that reduces costs automatically.
items.action: Remove manual cache breakpoints from your Claude API calls

items.title: GPT-5.2 derived a new result in theoretical physics.
items.raw_summary:
GPT-5.2 derived a new result in theoretical physics.

We‚Äôre releasing the result in a preprint with researchers from @the_IAS, @VanderbiltU, @Cambridge_Uni, and @Harvard. It shows that a gluon interaction many physicists expected would not occur can arise under specific condition
items.why_it_matters: GPT-5.2 derives a novel result in theoretical physics (gluon interactions), published as a preprint with IAS, Harvard, and Cambridge researchers ‚Äî a concrete example of AI contributing to frontier science.
items.action: Read the preprint to understand AI-assisted scientific discovery workflows

items.title: AI can make work faster, but a fear is that relying on it may make it harder to learn new skills on
items.raw_summary:
AI can make work faster, but a fear is that relying on it may make it harder to learn new skills on the job.

We ran an experiment with software engineers to learn more. Coding with AI led to a decrease in mastery‚Äîbut this depended on how people used it.
https://t.co/lbxgP11I4I
items.why_it_matters: Anthropic's experiment shows coding with AI decreases skill mastery ‚Äî but the effect depends on usage patterns, offering nuanced guidance for teams adopting AI coding tools.
items.action: Review the study to set team guidelines for AI-assisted development

items.raw_summary:

items.why_it_matters: Figma ships the ability to import Claude Code UI work directly as editable Figma frames ‚Äî bridging the gap between AI-generated code and design iteration.
items.action: Update the Figma MCP server and try code-to-design workflows

items.title: We just open-sourced the system we use to manage 30 parallel AI coding agents per person.
items.raw_summary:
We just open-sourced the system we use to manage 30 parallel AI coding agents per person.

40K lines of TypeScript. 3,288 tests. 17 plugins. Built in 8 days ‚Äî by the agents it orchestrates.

Yes, we used Agent Orchestrator to build Agent Orchestrator.

Some numbers:
‚Üí 500+ agent-hours in 24 human-hours (20x leverage)
‚Üí 86 of 102 PRs created by AI (84%)
‚Üí After Day 4, I stopped writing code entirely

Spawn agents. Step away. Ship faster.
items.why_it_matters: An open-source system for managing 30 parallel AI coding agents (40K lines, 3.2K tests) demonstrates practical patterns for orchestrating agent swarms at scale.
items.action: Review the repo for multi-agent orchestration patterns

items.title: llmfit. Useful tool that probes hardware and tells you exactly which LLMs will actually run.
items.raw_summary:
llmfit. Useful tool that probes hardware and tells you exactly which LLMs will actually run.
- handles MoE expert offloading, picks the best quantization for your RAM, estimates tokens/sec before you even pull the weights.
Essential for local dev.
https://t.co/qn8PmqQNbV https://t.co/7z7yvOdNNC
items.why_it_matters: llmfit probes your hardware and recommends which LLMs will actually run locally, including MoE offloading and quantization selection ‚Äî solving a common pain point for local AI development.
items.action: Run llmfit to optimize your local LLM setup
